Class Item_ManaBottle

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • Item_ManaBottle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Equipable, java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Item_ManaBottle
extends java.awt.Rectangle
    Stellt die einsammelbaren Manaflaschen des Spielfeldes dar. Erben von der Klasse Item.
    Author:
    Mike Bechtel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
